title: Big Russel
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Fast food, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fast food restaurant with a few positive differences in quality and freshness. It's one of very few places in this city that provides vegan food. Offers a vegan handmade burger ('veggie burger' - burger bun, salad, hash brown and sauce), vegan french fries, and salads. The staff knows the term 'vegan' and can tell you which sauces and vinaigrette are animal-free.
